articles.description: The Champions League quarter-finals get underway on Tuesday and Wednesday as Europe's biggest clubs eye a place in the final in Istanbul
articles.title: Rudiger dismissed from Chelsea training due to Kepa bust-up - Goal.com

articles.content:
The EPCR have confirmed Leinster's Heineken Champions Cup quarter-final date and kick-off time.
After a weekend off, owing to a positive test in the Toulon squad, Leo Cullen's side will play Exeter … [+835 chars]
articles.description: The EPCR have confirmed Leinster's Heineken Champions Cup quarter-final date and kick-off time with Leo Cullen's side set to play Exeter Chiefs on Saturday at Sandy Park (5:30pm). Ulster will play Northampton Saints in the Challenge Cup quarter-final at Frank…
articles.title: Irish province's European quarter-final dates confirmed - RTE.ie

articles.content:
The UK medical regulator says that out of 30 people who suffered rare blood clots after receiving the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine, seven have died.
The British acknowledgement of deaths comes as seve… [+4633 chars]
articles.description: A number of European countries have paused the rollout of the AstraZeneca vaccine or limited its use to older people, with the European Medicines Agency (EMA) expected to announce updated advice on 7 April.
articles.title: Seven deaths in UK linked to AstraZeneca jab as some European countries scale back rollout - SBS News
